info: Here, you will find the best algorithms for Flipping on the bazaar of Hypixel skyblock!
On this page, you have a global overview on the best items to flip. Click on an item for more details.

graphs.title: Graphs
graphs.desc: Graphical representation of the different scores.

information: The scores are recalculated every push of the Hypixel API (so each 2min).
disclaimer: To update scores, you must go back to the
margeScore: The Marge is the ratio in percent between the buy price and the sell price of an item.
The cells that provide details associate to the marge are the one just to the right and the 'Marge percent' one.
priceScore: Price score is just the score compared to price (see the graph 'Price Score' in the sidebar on the
On the cellule next to it, we find P (the product price) multiplied by 32, 128 and 1024
An input is placed in the cell below to put your own multiplier
demandScore: The supply and demand is a delta between the amount of purchase and the amount of sells. You can see the stats in the last cells of the sheet
The bigger the difference, the less fair the supply and demand are, and the lower the score will be.
about.popuScore: Mix between the price and the suplly/demand algorithms. Based on the volume purchased compared to the price.
